thread.title: Lood de Jager and RWC players tall?
thread.title_full: Lood de Jager and RWC players tall? | News24

author: news24.com
title: Lood de Jager and RWC players tall?
text:
Your article mentioning Lood de Jager as 6ft 9” (almost 2,06m) and the tallest RWC player, Devon Toner, as 6ft 10” (2.08m) is interesting.
In professional basketball most centers (the tall man in the team) are over 2.08m.
The tallest current NBA Your article mentioning Lood de Jager as 6ft 9 inches (almost 2,06m) and the tallest RWC player, Devon Toner, as 6ft 10” (2.08m) is interesting.
In professional basketball most centers (the tall man in the team) are over 2.08m. Victor and Lood will thus be ideal small forwards if they played basketball professionally at international level.
Would love to see them dunk a basketball.
Then again, I would love to see the athletic Marc Gasol 2.16m (7ft 1”) or DeMarcus Cousins 2.11m (6ft 11”) compete on a rugby field.
